summary: This document contains a series of Citibank account statements for SLK DESIGNS LLC from August 2012 to July 2013. The statements show regular business expenses, payroll processing, and tax payments, along with two significant incoming wire transfers from Jeffrey E. Epstein. The account is associated with an address in New York City. This document is a series of bank statements for SLK DESIGNS LLC from Citibank, covering the period from June 2013 to July 2014. The statements show regular $1,500 wire transfers from Jeffrey Epstein to the company's account, alongside recurring payroll, tax, and health insurance payments. This appears to be financial evidence of Epstein's funding of this entity. This document consists of bank statements for SLK DESIGNS LLC from Citibank, covering June to October 2014. The statements show payroll and tax payments, health insurance premiums, and a significant incoming wire transfer from an account associated with Jeffrey Epstein. The account was closed in October 2014.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein sent multiple wire transfers totaling at least $64,689.80 to the SLK DESIGNS LLC account between August 2012 and June 2013.
SLK DESIGNS LLC is a business entity with a New York City address, initially at 301 East 66th Street and later at 575 Lexington Avenue.

The account statements show regular business activity including payroll processing (via ADP), tax payments, insurance premiums (Oxford Health, The Hartford), and legal service payments (CT Corporation).
The document is a financial record subpoenaed as part of the Epstein investigation, showing a direct financial link between Epstein and this business entity.
The account was a 'CitiBusiness Streamlined Checking' account, indicating it was for business purposes.
Jeffrey Epstein made regular $1,500 wire transfers to the SLK DESIGNS LLC account between August 2013 and December 2013.
In April 2014, Epstein made a single, much larger wire transfer of $20,000 to the SLK DESIGNS LLC account.
The SLK DESIGNS LLC account was used to pay for payroll services (ADP), taxes, and health insurance premiums (Oxford Health, The Hartford).
The account statements show the financial activity of SLK DESIGNS LLC, a company potentially linked to or funded by Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and appears to be part of a financial evidence set (EFTA series) related to the Epstein case.
A $30,000 wire transfer from an account associated with Jeffrey Epstein was deposited into the SLK DESIGNS LLC account on June 30, 2014.
The SLK DESIGNS LLC account was used for business expenses including payroll, tax payments (via ADP), and health insurance premiums (Oxford Health).
The account was active from at least June 2014 and was closed in October 2014.
The business address for SLK DESIGNS LLC was 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY.
